entry.title: Training an agent to win at Lunar Lander

link.title: Training an agent to win at Lunar Lander

entry.content:
In reinforcement learning, an agent gets rewarded or punished for its actions in a given environment, and over time optimizes itself to better perform in the environment as it learns what actions to take when.

In this blog post, we will demonstrate reinforcement learning by training an AI to win Lunar Lander, a classic arcade game from 1979.
entry.summary: In reinforcement learning, an agent gets rewarded or punished for its actions in a given environment, and over time optimizes itself to better perform in the environment as it learns what actions to take when.
